Private Turbo Board - Air Command - Evac

  1. My opponent played a Secret Action. Does that count as one of the 2 cards they can play? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. Note that if they end up revealing a Secret Action during their turn, thatâ€™s not playing a card.
  2. If you have Private Turbo Board defending against Optimus Prime - Battlefield Legend, after his opponent already played an Upgrade and an Action for their turn, and Optimus flips an Action, may he use it? [Source: WotC]
    No.
